questions.question: What is the predominant color of the main body of the device?
What brand is prominently displayed on the device's surface?
What is the overall shape of the device?
What material appears to constitute the device's outer casing?
What type of device is this, based on its visual features and text?
Describe the texture of the top surface of the device.
What is the color of the text on the device?
Is there an apparent power cord or cable connected to the device?
Are there any visible safety or warning symbols on the device?
Does the device have a visible model number or identifier?
What is the general appearance of the device's surface finish?
Based on the visible markings, what is the voltage range?
What type of connector is visible at one end of the device?
Describe the style of lettering used for the brand name.
What is the apparent size and weight of the device, visually?
